title: [caffe2] error: ‘create’ is not a member of ‘cv::DualTVL1OpticalFlow’
body_html:
Hi,
I try to install caffe2 on ubuntu16.04 by make ,and always displays this error:

/home/lyx/pytorch/caffe2/video/optical_flow.cc: In function ‘void caffe2::OpticalFlowExtractor(const cv::Mat&, const cv::Mat&, int, cv::Mat&)’:
/home/lyx/pytorch/caffe2/video/optical_flow.cc:10:43: error: ‘create’ is not a member of ‘cv::DualTVL1OpticalFlow’
cv::Ptrcv::DualTVL1OpticalFlow tvl1 = cv::DualTVL1OpticalFlow::create();
^
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:1886: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/video/optical_flow.cc.o' failed
make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/video/optical_flow.cc.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** 正在等待未完成的任务....
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1299: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** 正在等待未完成的任务....
Compiling src/reduce_scatter.cu > /home/lyx/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/obj/reduce_scatter.o
ptxas warning : Too big maxrregcount value specified 96, will be ignored
Linking libnccl.so.1.3.5 > /home/lyx/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/lib/libnccl.so.1.3.5
Archiving libnccl_static.a > /home/lyx/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/lib/libnccl_static.a
[ 47%] No install step for 'nccl_external'
[ 48%] Completed 'nccl_external'
[ 48%] Built target nccl_external
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

  • PyTorch or Caffe2:
  • Python version: 2.7.14
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0/5.1.10
  • GPU models and configuration:
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 5.4
  • CMake version: 3.5.1
    -OpenCV version: 3.1.0

What should I do to solve this problem? Thanks.

Hi,
I try to install caffe2  on ubuntu16.04 by make ,and always displays this error:
/home/lyx/pytorch/caffe2/video/optical_flow.cc: In function ‘void caffe2::OpticalFlowExtractor(const cv::Mat&, const cv::Mat&, int, cv::Mat&)’:

body:
Hi,
 I try to install caffe2  on ubuntu16.04 by make ,and always displays this error:

/home/lyx/pytorch/caffe2/video/optical_flow.cc: In function ‘void caffe2::OpticalFlowExtractor(const cv::Mat&, const cv::Mat&, int, cv::Mat&)’:
/home/lyx/pytorch/caffe2/video/optical_flow.cc:10:43: error: ‘create’ is not a member of ‘cv::DualTVL1OpticalFlow’
   cv::Ptr<cv::DualTVL1OpticalFlow> tvl1 = cv::DualTVL1OpticalFlow::create();
                                           ^
caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/build.make:1886: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/video/optical_flow.cc.o' failed
make[2]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/video/optical_flow.cc.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** 正在等待未完成的任务....
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:1299: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** 正在等待未完成的任务....
Compiling src/reduce_scatter.cu               > /home/lyx/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/obj/reduce_scatter.o
ptxas warning : Too big maxrregcount value specified 96, will be ignored
Linking   libnccl.so.1.3.5                    > /home/lyx/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/lib/libnccl.so.1.3.5
Archiving libnccl_static.a                    > /home/lyx/pytorch/third_party/nccl/build/lib/libnccl_static.a
[ 47%] No install step for 'nccl_external'
[ 48%] Completed 'nccl_external'
[ 48%] Built target nccl_external
Makefile:138: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

- PyTorch or Caffe2:
- Python version: 2.7.14
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0/5.1.10
- GPU models and configuration:
- GCC version (if compiling from source): 5.4
- CMake version: 3.5.1
-OpenCV version: 3.1.0

What should I do to solve this problem? Thanks.
